thought: The Slack action (action_2) failed due to missing or incorrect parameters. I need to set the correct parameters for sending messages to the Slack channel #news, including the required 'text' parameter with expression '={{$json["text"]}}' and channelId with mode 'name' and value 'news'.
plan: Set Slack action parameters with select='channel', channelId as name='news', messageType='text', and text expression to extract from input data
Test sending messages to Slack channel #news
Verify that Slack messages are sent successfully with correct content
criticism: Currently, the Slack action has empty params, so it cannot send messages. This is the root cause of the failure.

tool_input.comments: Send classification results to Slack channel #news with proper parameters.
